text: Berk Oktay (born October 28, 1982) is a Turkish model and actor, known for his leading roles as Can Tekin in the Show TV series İlişki Durumu: Karışık and Hakan Demirer in the Star TV and later Fox TV series Benim Hala Umudum Var alongside actress Gizem Karaca and actor Şükrü Özyıldız. He has faced allegations of violence by his former wife.http://www.gazetevatan.com/berk- oktay-in-esi-kocam-beni-dovdu-yardim-edin--1152241-magazin/ Their divorce was finalized in 2020. == Filmography == === Television === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
